title: Like DRS, I Like My DnB with a Little Soul
message: Shout out to all my liquid heads. Welcome! This is an playful experiment in something I call imprints of experience. You all now own one of these imprints, one of two bad boy liquid DnB records. A gift from Snip! Enjoy the tunes, be sure to check back here now and again to see if and how this space evolves. Hopefully one day it will become a shared memory space, we can all help curate and evolve. But who knows. For now it is just a bit of fun! Much love x. P.S sorry Sen not got the playlist for this one on YouTube yet.
